慕名.definition: to admire sb's reputation; to seek out famous person or location

慕名而來.definition: to come to a place on account of its reputation (idiom); attracted to visit a famous location

慕士塔格峰.definition: Muztagh Ata, second highest peak of the Pamir Mountains

慕容.definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑[Xian1bei1] nomadic people; two-character surname Murong

慕尼黑.definition: München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany

慕田峪.definition: Mutianyu, well-preserved section of the Great Wall 70km from Beijing
